title: Gemini Compatibility: What's the Worst Sign a Gemini Can Date?

steps.title: Scorpio
steps.content: Scorpio Astrology experts agree that dark, brooding Scorpio is the worst match for bright, bubbly Gemini. As air signs, Geminis are all about communication—preferably, clever and fast-paced conversation. These playful folks love to socialize, laugh, and have a good time. Scorpios are the opposite—they’re serious, emotional, and secretive. They also tend to be lone wolves, which Gemini doesn't gel with at all. [1] X Research source This couple’s biggest hurdle: Wildly different energies. Positive aspects of this match: Tons of chemistry in the bedroom. That's usually not enough to sustain this couple for long, though. It’s also important that Gemini demonstrate their trustworthiness and honesty in this relationship, since Scorpios are so slow to trust others and value the truth above all else. Reader Poll: We asked 637 wikiHow readers with the Scorpio zodiac sign, and 67% of them agreed that their biggest deal breaker is someone who lies . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Taurus
steps.content: Taurus As an earth sign, Taurus is known for being stubborn, cautious, and serious. Taurus also tends to be introverted and prefers to have a small circle of friends. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Gemini is a classic air sign—spontaneous, chatty, and lighthearted. They love to socialize and have tons of friends! Taurus will see Gemini as flighty and unstable, whereas Gemini will view Taurus as boring and predictable. This couple’s biggest hurdle: Incompatible worldviews. Positive aspects of this match: Opposites really can attract if both signs are willing to put the effort in and be patient with each other.

steps.title: Capricorn
steps.content: Capricorn Gemini’s wild, unconventional nature doesn’t mesh well with Capricorn’s love of stability and routine. Capricorn will see Gemini as reckless and shallow, and Gemini’s spontaneous nature will destabilize them. Gemini need constant amusement, so they will view Capricorn as an epic stick in the mud. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. These signs are on totally different pages. It’s debatable if those pages are even in the same book! This couple’s biggest hurdle: Major lifestyle clashes. Positive aspects of this match: Capricorn can be a much-needed grounding force for Gemini, and Gemini can help Capricorn loosen up and enjoy life—if they manage to look past their differences.

steps.title: Cancer
steps.content: Cancer As a water sign, Cancer is naturally emotional, sensitive, and nurturing. They like to stick close to home and rely on the safety of their daily routines. On the other hand, Gemini is a social butterfly and all-around adventurer. Following a routine is just not in a Gem’s nature since they thrive on change. Gemini also prioritize mental pursuits over emotional ones (a common air sign-water sign clash). [4] X Research source This couple’s biggest hurdle: Mismatched energies. Positive aspects of this match: Cancer can help Gemini open up on an emotional level if Gemini is willing to be patient with them.

steps.title: Sagittarius
steps.content: Sagittarius These two will be drawn to each other initially. Both are outgoing, energetic, and enjoy interesting conversations, so there’s a lot of chemistry at first. But Sagittarius’ tendency to be blunt, opinionated, and headstrong can get under the skin of lighthearted, go-with-the-flow Gemini. Communication usually takes a turn for the worse and their relationship quickly deteriorates after that. This couple’s biggest hurdle: Conflicting communication styles. Positive aspects of this match: On the zodiac wheel, Gemini and Sag are opposite each other, so their pairing is extreme. If they’re able to meet in the middle, though, it can be a good relationship.

steps.title: Pisces
steps.content: Pisces Pisces is a water sign, which means emotions are everything to these folks. Gemini, on the other hand, is not particularly emotional—Gemini looks at the world in a logical way and has a rational mind. Gemini will struggle to give Pisces emotional support and won't fully understand their sensitive natures. Neither sign is particularly practical or consistent, so the relationship is terminally unstable. This couple’s biggest hurdle: Tenuous emotional connection. Positive aspects of this match: These two signs can be very complimentary in a relationship if they’re able to accept the other’s nature and put in the work to stay emotionally connected.

steps.title: Virgo
steps.content: Virgo Virgo is an earth sign, which means these folks are practical, down to earth, and logical. They can also be quite shy and reserved. These traits clash a bit with Gemini’s tendency to be flighty, inconsistent, and extremely social. Virgos also tend to be hypercritical, which can be a little negative for Gemini’s taste. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. This couple’s biggest hurdle: Incompatible introvert/extrovert natures. Positive aspects of this match: Gemini and Virgo have a lot in common, so this relationship can work as long as Virgo can accept Gemini’s unpredictable nature and Gemini can roll with Virgo’s tendency to be a serious homebody. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Libra
steps.content: Libra These two air signs have everything in common and their mental connection is incredibly strong—this is crucial for air signs. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Libra and Gemini meet each other’s needs almost perfectly and their energies are incredibly in sync. They bring out the best in each other and almost always end up being the proverbial match made in heaven. Pitfalls to watch for: Libra tends to be more serious about marriage than Gemini. They also share the exact same flaws (inconsistent, flighty, hyper logical), which can sometimes cause problems over time.

steps.title: Gemini
steps.content: Gemini Air signs get along famously with each other, so naturally Gemini is drawn to Gemini. Since Gemini is represented by twins, putting two Geminis together can feel a little crowded, but they love all that energy in the same place. They understand each other on an incredibly deep level and never judge each other. They may have more fun than any other pairing in the zodiac! Pitfalls to watch for: Having the exact same flaws isn’t always smooth sailing. Geminis are high-energy and high-strung, so anxiety can be a common theme.

steps.title: Leo
steps.content: Leo Leo is fun-loving, outgoing, and positive, which Gemini loves. Leo adores Gemini’s witty banter and nonstop energy, so putting these two signs together is quite the party. They have a strong connection from the very start and it takes a lot to break their bond. They also have amazing chemistry in the bedroom, which never hurts. [8] X Research source Pitfalls to watch out for: The constant socializing and thrill-seeking can eventually exhaust these two. Since they get bored easily, they’ll constantly up the ante and try to find more thrilling things to do, which can lead to toxic habits.

steps.title: Aries
steps.content: Aries This pairing is all about nonstop adventure and conversation—there's never a dull moment between them. Aries and Gemini are extremely attracted to each other on a mental and physical level, so their relationship is usually satisfying and rock-solid. Aries is a fire sign, so coupling up with an air sign essentially fans the flames of romance for them. Pitfalls to watch out for: Neither sign is particularly good at planning or completing projects, and they never stop moving. They’ll need to buckle down and work on having a little foresight to make their relationship last long-term.

steps.title: Aquarius
steps.content: Aquarius Air signs almost always complement each other in romantic relationships, so these two make a great couple. They share a love for socializing and intelligent conversation, have lots of energy, and truly understand each other on a deep level. Both signs are very quirky and they tend to revel in each other’s quirks, which creates a lot of fun, creative energy. Pitfalls to watch out for: Air signs are all about mental connection, so their emotional connection can suffer a bit if they aren’t careful. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.
